Valdivia is a city in the south of Chile, located in the area of Los Ríos. It is known for having one of the few navigable rivers of Chile, the Calle Calle. Valdivia has, as one of its principal economic activities, the shipbuilding industry, logging, paper, cellulose (Celco), brewing, and milling. Tourism plays an important role, and so do the educational university services, headed by the Universidad de Austral de Chile.

loans.use: to repair the car she uses for her work to provide her services

loans.name: Namulanda A Group

texts.en:
Greetings from Namulanda A Group in Western Kenya! Metrine is the facilitator of the Namulanda A group. This group joined One Acre Fund in the year 2011 and will re-enroll in the 2012 program.

Metrine takes care of six children at home. She joined One Acre Fund in order to access fertilizer and hybrid seeds and to ensure food security for her family. In the recent 2011 season, Metrine had a good maize yield harvesting 10 bags on 1/2 acre of land. Before joining One Ace Fund, Metrine was only able to harvest six bags of maize on 1/2 acre of land.

With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important inputs to distribute to Metrine and her group during Kenya’s next planting season in February 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund’s integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit and insurance.

With income from her maize sales, Metrine will educate her children, ensure food security and invest in livestock rearing.

In 2012, the members of Namulanda A group will each plant between ½ and 1 acre of maize.

loans.use: To source farming inputs, such as seeds and fertilizer, at low prices for the 2012 planting season.

loans.name: Jhon Jairo

texts.es:
Durante toda su vida el señor Jhon Jairo se ha dedicado al comercio  puesto que toda su familia ha sido comerciante y fueron sus padres que desde niño le enseñaron a trabajar; en los últimos once años ha laborado en  su propia tienda vendiendo productos como snaks, gaseosas, galletas, productos de aseo personal, gomas de mascar, lácteos entre otros productos que suplan las necesidades de sus clientes, quienes lo aprecian y reconocen en el sector.
A sus 54 años este hombre soltero vela por el bienestar de su comunidad, destacándose por su honestidad y amabilidad con sus clientes. Don Jhon Jairo espera comprar más surtido para su tiene y asi tener más ingresos que desea ahorrar para cumplir su gran sueño de tener su propia finca con negocio muy cerca de la carretera o vía principal de su municipio.
texts.en:
Throughout his life Jhon Jairo has been a salesman.  His entire family has been in business and it was his parents who taught him as a child how to work.  In the past 11 years he has worked in his own store, selling items such as snacks, soft drinks, cookies, personal use products, gum, and milk products, among other things that meet his customers’ needs.  They all know and appreciate him in his sector.

At age 54, this single gentleman works for the well-being of his community, working honestly and being friendly to his customers.  Jhon Jairo would like to buy more items for his store so that he can increase his earnings and be able to achieve his grandest dream of having his own farm as a business, close to the main road in town.

loans.use: to buy inventory for his store.

loans.name: Serafina

texts.es:
Serafina es socia del Banco Comunal Prosperidad, tiene un puesto D. comida en el mercado, el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra D. arroz, azúcar, fideos, y para la educación D. sus hijos.
En todo el tiempo que tiene como socia Serafina ha visto como su negocio ha crecido, recuerda que antes su puesto era solo D. carrizo ahora ya es D. material noble. Le encanta el apoyo que le brinda Finca con las capacitaciones que le ayudaron en su vida personal como en su negocio, le enseñaron a poder tener un negocio próspero.
texts.en:
Serafina is a member of the Prosperidad (Prosperity) Communal Bank.  She has a food stall in the market.  She is seeking a loan to invest in buying rice, sugar, and noodles and to help pay for her children's education.

During the time that Serafina has been a member of the group,  she has seen her business grow.  She remembers that before, her stall was only a cart, but now it is maD. of proper materials.  She is pleased with the help she has received from microfinance partner FINCA, which has helped her in her personal life as much as her work and which has taught her how to have a prosperous business.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, and noodles for her food stall.

loans.name: Rosa Ivania

texts.es: Rosa emprendedora, trabajadora desde hace un tiempo tiene su propio negocio venta de variedades. Junto a su esposo han ido realizándole mejoras a su vivienda ya que sus planes es tener completamente de concreto la infraestructura. El préstamo anterior fue de gran beneficio ya que cumplió con los pedidos de su clientela. Para este nuevo ciclo de préstamo tiene proyectado vender más para invertir en su vivienda he comodidad de sus hijos. Comprara productos como: ropa de damas, caballeros, niños, zapatos, cosméticos, bisutería, perfumes, lociones para caballeros, desodorantes, pantalones, ropas interiores entre otros productos que para en este tiempo de fiesta navideña son buscadas en mayores cantidades por sus clientes. Agradece a la financiera por el apoyo al desarrollo de su negocio.
texts.en:
Rosa is an enterprising, hardworking woman. For some time she has had her own business selling a range of items. Together with her husband she has carried out some improvements on their home. Their plan is to have its structure completely concreted. 

The previous loan was very beneficial and Rosa completed her customers' orders. Her plan for this new loan cycle is to sell more, in order to invest in her home and her children's wellbeing. She will buy products including women's, men's and children's clothing, shoes, cosmetics, costume jewellery, perfume, men's grooming products, deodorant, trousers and underwear among other products. At Christmas time her customers look for items like these in larger quantities. 

She is grateful to the financing organisation for helping her business to grow.

loans.use: to buy  women's, men's and children's clothing, shoes, cosmetics, costume jewellery, perfume, men's grooming products, deodorant, trousers and underwear.

loans.name: Fredy Alberto

texts.es:
Durante algunos años Fredy se ha desempeñado como operario en algunas empresas de Medellín y desea iniciar su propio negocio para ofrecerle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia conformada por su esposa y sus dos hijos de 16 y 17 años.

En su propia casa desea adecuar un espacio para iniciar con una sala de internet para ofrecerle este servicio a sus vecinos y para ello necesita de un préstamo para realizar las adecuaciones locativas del espacio.
texts.en:
For some years, Fredy has worked for various companies in Medellín, but he now wants to start his own business so that he can offer a better quality of life to his family, which consists of his wife and two children, who are 16 and 17.

He wants to remodel part of his house to start an internet cafe so he can offer this service to his neighbors.  He will use this loan to make the necessary changes to the space.

loans.use: convert part of his home into an internet cafe.

loans.name: Tumaini Group

texts.en:
Christine is the facilitator of the Tumaini group. Christine and her group joined One Acre Fund in the year 2011 and will re-enroll in the 2012 program.

With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important inputs to distribute to Christine and her group during Kenya’s next planting season in February 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund’s integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit and insurance.

She joined One Acre Fund in order to access fertilizer and hybrid seeds and ensure food security for her family. In the recent 2011 season, Christine had a very good maize yield harvesting 18 bags on one acre of land. Before joining One Ace Fund, Christine was only able to harvest six bags of maize on one acre of land.

With income from her maize sales, Christine will invest in a cow and educate her children.

In 2012, the members of Tumaini group will each plant maize plots between ½ and 1 acre of land.

The photograph shows the members of the group.

loans.use: To source farming inputs, such as seeds and fertilizer, at low prices for the 2012 planting season.

loans.name: Crisanta

texts.es: Crisanta D. 56 años D. edad casado con Julián D. 56 años fruto D. este amor tienen 2 hijos. Ellos viven en su casa propia ubicada en el centro poblado D. Puerto Amargura del distrito D. LLochegua. DesD. hace 27 años Crisanta viene dedicándose con mucho esmero y perseverancia en la actividad agrícola, con el único fin D. lograr una D. sus metas trazadas y darles una buena educación, alimentación y estabilidad a sus queridos hijos. Si bien al comienzo ella solo contaba con una pequeña parcela D. cultivo D. cacao, por lo que decidió ampliar su terreno, para así producir en grandes volúmenes. Ella trabaja en compañía D. su querido esposo y sus 2 hijos, pero a la vez tiene a su cargo peones que puedan facilitarle en el cultivo D. su producto D. cacao. Una vez recolectado sus productos ella los expenD. a los acopiadores que pagan un buen precio. En un futuro piensa trabajar en la agricultura, adquiriendo nuevos terrenos para cultivar nuevos productos que tengan mayor demanda en el mercado nacional como el Sacha inchi, el Mani y frutas cítricas. Este será su segundo préstamos con MFP, por lo que se compromete una vez más en pagar puntualmente sus cuotas. Con los 2.000 nuevos soles, lo invertirá en la adquisición D. semillas D. plátano y maní.
texts.en:
Crisanta, 56, is married to Julián, also 56, and they have two children.  The live in their own house in the center of Puerto Amargura in the district of LLochegua.  For the last 27 years, Crisanta has been a careful and persistent farmer, her only aim being to achieve her goals and to give her beloved children a good education, food, and stability.  At first, she started with a small plot of cocoa, then she decided to expand her land to increase her volume of production,  She works with her dear husband and two children, but she also has day laborers, who help her with  the cocoa cultivation.  Once her products are harvested, she sells them to buyers, who give her a good price.  In the future, she expects to continue farming, acquiring more land to raise new products that are in greater demand in the national market, such as Sacha Inchi (Inca peanuts), peanuts, and citrus fruits.  

This will be her second loan with Kiva partner MFP, and she promises to pay her installments on time.  She will use the 2,000 nuevos soles ($750) to buy banana and peanut seeds.

loans.use: to buy banana and peanuts seeds.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy t-shirts, pants, legwarmers and bags for the Christmas season

loans.name: Gloria Amparo

texts.es:
Gloria Amparo tiene 4 hijos y es consciente que para ofrecerles un mejor futuro necesita contribuir con su trabajo al cubrimiento de los gastos del hogar, para ello, desde hace más de 2 años, esta emprendora vende en su propa casa tropa por encargo, productos por catálogo y variedades, así como helados. 

Gloria necesita de un préstamo para comprar 2 vitrinas para acomodar y exhibir mejor sus productos, así como para comprar algunos productos de belleza de los catálogos que llegan a menor precio con el fin de comprar mayor cantidad y así incrementar sus ganancias. 

En el futuro sueña con tener su propio almacén donde ofrezca gran variedad de productos a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Gloria Amparo has four children and she is aware that, in order to offer them a better future, she needs to work so that she can contribute towards covering her household expenses.  For this reason, more than two years ago this entrepreneur started selling goods from her home.  She sells catalog goods, miscellaneous goods and iced treats.

Gloria needs a loan to buy two display cases in which to better display her products.  She will also buy some catalog beauty products which are cheaper when you buy in bulk.  In this way, she will increase her profits.

In the future, Gloria dreams of owning her own store where she will sell a large variety of products to her customers.

loans.use: to buy display cases and stock

loans.name: Llamitas De Oro Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “LLAMITAS DE ORO” iniciará su primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del centro focal German Busch, está compuesta por siete integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Beatriz. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: venta de cordero, costura de faldas, trenzado de mantas, elaboración de billeteras, tienda Entel..

La señora Beatriz,  indica que hace dos años  que trabaja en Pro Mujer y que integro la institución por invitación de una amiga. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de costura de centros que viene trabajando hace años, aprendiendo el mismo de su mamá.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra de tela) que comprara de Cochabamba y posteriormente lo venderá en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, es soltera y tiene dos hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta todo.
texts.en:
The “LLAMITAS DE ORO” community bank are about to start their first loan cycle with Pro Mujer, as part of the German Busch regional office.  This group has seven members and is run by a board of directors which is led by Beatriz.  The businesses that the members of the bank are engaged in are varied and include: selling lamb, sewing skirts, braiding blankets, making wallets and running an Entel. store.

Beatriz tells us that she has been working with Pro Mujer for two years and that she joined through an invitation from a friend.  She has a sewing business that she has been working in for years, having learned the business from her mom.

The loan that Beatriz is currently taking out will be used to increase her capital (buying fabric).  She will buy her fabric in Cochabamba and then sell it in her sales location.  This work allows her to make money with which to support her family.  Beatriz is single and has two children.

When we asked her what she likes about Pro Mujer, Beatriz replied that she likes everything.

loans.use: to buy fabric

loans.name: Abel

texts.es:
El señor Abel tiene 44 años de edad, esta casado y vive con sus tres hijos y su esposa, Abel se dedica desde hace 8 años a la venta de helados en su motocicleta, visita barrios, colonias y lugares aledaños a su comunidad,  sus ventas son de lunes a sábado, Abel es una persona muy positiva y dinámica, le gusta asistir a la iglesia todos los domingos.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de ice cream, paletas y conos,  el calor es mas intenso en esa zona y muchas personas comprar este tipo de porducto.
Su sueño es tener su propia casa.
texts.en:
Abel is 44 years old, married, and lives with his wife and three children.  He has been selling iced treats from his motorcycle for 8 years.  He visits neighborhoods, residential developments and places near his community.  He makes his sales from Monday to Saturday.  Abel is a very positive and dynamic person.  He enjoys attending church every Sunday.

Abel will use his loan to buy ice cream, iced lollies and cones.  The heat is more intense in this region and many people buy this type of product.

Abel's dream is to own his own home.

loans.use: to buy ice cream, iced lollies and cones

loans.name: Elva Rosalía

texts.es: Elva es socia del Banco Comunal Prosperidad, tiene 40 años, ella es dueña de un empresa de transporte y flete además vende agregados, es madre de 2 niños, es socia de Finca Peru desde hace 11 años, ella empezó con una tienda de abarrotes y viajaba a las ferias, y cambio de negocio a la de los agregados y se pudo comprar sus carros con la ayuda de Finca y porque le enseñaron a poder ahorrar, agradece la confianza que le brindan, le ayudan a poder tener un historial crediticio bueno, ahora el préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de combustible, su gran meta es poder construir su casa.
texts.en: Elva is a member of the Prosperidad community bank.  She is 40 years old and owns a transport business.  She also sells aggregates.  She is the mother of two children and has been a member of Finca Peru for 11 years.  She started out running a grocery store and traveling to street markets.  She changed business and started selling aggregates.  She was able to buy her cars with the help of Finca because they taught her to save.  She is grateful for the trust that is placed in her and for the help that she has had in establishing a good credit record.  She will invest her current loan in buying fuel.  Elva's biggest goal is to build her house.

loans.use: to buy fuel

loans.name: Oliva

texts.es:
A sus 51 años de edad, Oliva es una mujer emprendedora que desde hace algún tiempo inició en su propia casa con la venta de productos de la canasta familiar así como con la elaboración de chorizos para vender a sus vecinos y personas que transitan por la vereda del corregimiento de San Félix de Medellín, lugar donde vive con su esposo y su esposo y sus dos hijos. 

En el futuro, Oliva sueña con poder generar empleo e incrementar sus ventas. Por ahora necesita de un préstamo para comprar algunos productos de la canasta familiar para ofrecerle a sus clientes mayor variedad y también necesita comprar insumos para la elaboración de chorizos y así incrementar sus ventas.
texts.en:
At 51 years of age, Oliva is an entrepreneurial woman who started selling essential household groceries in her home some time ago.  She also makes chorizos to sell to her neighbors and people who pass by San Félix de Medellín township where she lives with her husband and her two children.

In the future, Oliva dreams of being able to create jobs and increase her sales.  For now, she needs a loan to buy some essential household groceries so that she can offer her customers a larger variety.  She also needs to buy supplies for making chorizos.  In this way, she will increase her sales.

loans.use: to buy essential household groceries and supplies for making chorizos

loans.name: Laura Matilde

texts.es:
Laura Matilde tiene 42 años de edad es casada tiene una hija, vive con el esposo la hija, nieta y madre en Guaranda sector cuatro esquinas Provincia de Bolívar.
LA VRC Cuatro Esquinas Central está formada por 12 socios que pertenecen al sector cuatro esquinas, los socios se dedican a diferentes actividades como son agricultura, crianza de animales, comercio y otros.
Laura se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio de quesos, siembra de papas, habas, alverja, tiene dos cabezas de ganado.
Las compras y ventas lo realiza en el mercado de Guaranda, Solicita el crédito para compra de animales (cerdos) compra de alimentos (balanceado9 para engorde.
Con la ayuda del crédito le ayudaría en mejorar el estilo de vida.
El sueño es tener un terreno y casa cerca de la ciudad, Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta es la baja de precios en los productos que se saca a la venta.
En los tiempos libres le gusta pasear, salir al pueblo para ir a la iglesia, fiestas de carnaval, San José y navidad.
texts.en:
Laura Matilde is 42 years old, married, and has one daughter.  She lives with her husband, daughter, granddaughter and mother in Cuatro Esquinas, in Guaranda, in Bolívar province.

The 'Cuatro Esquinas Central' community bank has 12 members who live in Cuatro Esquinas.  They work in different business activities such as farming, livestock raising, commerce, etc.

Laura farms, raises livestock and sells cheese.  She grows potatoes, beans and peas, and has two cows.

Laura makes her purchases and sales in Guaranda market.  She is requesting a loan to buy animals (pigs) and nutritionally-balanced feed with which to feed them.

The support of this loan will help Laura to improve her lifestyle.

Laura's dream is to own a plot of land and a house near the city.  The challenge she faces is the decrease in price of the products that she sells.

In her free time, Laura enjoys going for walks, going to the village to attend church, and celebrating Carnaval, San José and Christmas.

loans.use: to buy animals (pigs) and nutritionally-balanced feed with which to fatten them

loans.name: Espirita

texts.es: Espirita de 36 años de edad, viuda con 4 hijos ellos viven en su casa propia ubicado en el centro poblado de Puerto Amargura del distrito de LLochegua. A espirita siempre le ha gustado ser diferente a sus demás competencias, en cuanto a precio, calidad y buen servicio hacia sus clientes, no por algo en casi tiene 14 años dedicado al cultivo de cacao y café. Sin embargo aspira a más, como ampliar la siembra de plantas de cacao en otras zonas, así logrará producir en mayores cantidades, luego abastecer  a los grandes mayoristas en su propia localidad, así minimizará costos por el traslado del producto. Generalmente trabaja con la ayuda de sus hermanos e hijos, en el futuro desea abrir una tienda de abarrotes  ya que tiene una buena cantidad de vecinos que le exigen, aparte de ello no hay una tienda de abarrotes cerca de ellos, es todo esto que la anima pero le falta capital para montar una. Este será su segundo credito con MFP, por lo que se compromete una vez más en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 2,000 nuevos soles, comprará andamios para su nueva tienda de abarrotes que piensa montar.
texts.en:
Espirita is 36 years old, a widow with 4 children. They live in their own house located in the town of Puerto Amargua in the district of Llochegua. 

Espirita always likes to be different than the competition, in pricing, quality and excellent customer service. Not for nothing has she worked for almost 14 years growing cocoa and coffee. None the less, she hopes for more, such as expanding the planting of cocoa in other areas, and producing in larger quantities, and later supply the major retailers in her own neighborhood and thus minimizing the costs of transporting the product. Usually she works with the help of her siblings and children. 

In the future she hopes to open a grocery store because she has a lot of neighbors but none-the-less there is no nearby grocery store. It is all that cheers her up, but she lacks the money to do it. 

This will be her 2nd loan through MFP, and once again she promises to make her payments on time. With the 2,000 soles, she will buy scaffolding for the new grocery store that she is planning to build.

loans.use: to buy scaffolding for the new grocery store that she is planning to build

loans.name: Tomasa

texts.es:
La señora Tomasa es socia del banco comunal Bellavista del Distrito Calleria, Departamento D. Ucayali, tiene 63 años D. edad, está casada y tiene 5 hijos.
Se dedica a la venta D. comida, esta actividad la realiza por las noches en el patio D. su casa, como vive en una calle concurrida tiene muchos clientes que acuden a saborear sus potajes, cuenta con la ayuda D. una señora que se encarga D. los asados en la parrilla.
Con su nuevo préstamo D. S/. 1,300.00 nuevos soles comprará: 7 planchas D. calaminas, 1 kilo D. clavos, 5 listones, pago mano D. obra del carpintero, todo este préstamo lo utilizará en la elaboración D. un techo D. calaminas para protegerse D. las lluvias, D. lo contrario, en días D. lluvia no pueD. salir a trabajar.
Esta muy agradecida con Manuela Ramos por darle los préstamos que solicita a pesar D. su edad, necesita trabajar porque es parte D. su vida, lo hizo todo el tiempo para poder criar a sus hijos
texts.en:
Tomasa is a member of the Bellavista community bank, which is located in Calleria district, in Ucayali department.  She is 63 years old, married, and has five children.

Tomasa's business is selling food.  She carries out this business in the evenings, from the courtyard area outsiD. her home.  She lives in a busy street and so has a lot of customers who come to savor her stews.  She has the help of a lady who takes care of barbecuing food on the grill.

With this new loan for 1,300 soles, Tomasa will buy seven sheets of corrugated metal, one kilo of nails and five units of lumber.  She will also pay a carpenter for his services.  She will use her loan to have a metal roof built which will protect her from the rain.  Without this, she is unable to go out and work on rainy days.

Tomasa is very grateful to Manuela Ramos for giving her loans which she requests, in spite of her age.  She needs to work because it is part of her life.  She worked all the time in order to be able to raise her children.

loans.use: to buy building supplies

loans.name: Elgiba

texts.es:
La señora Elgiba es socia del banco comunal Bellavista del Distrito D. Calleria, Departamento D. Ucayali, tiene 60 años D. edad, está casada y tiene seis hijos.
Se dedica a la venta D. bebidas, son años que viene trabajando con los préstamos D. Manuel Ramos, solo uno D. sus hijos vive en su casa, pero ya es independiente económicamente. 
Con su nuevo préstamo D. S/. 3,000.00 nuevos soles comprará: 10 cajas D. gaseosa, 7 paquetes D. gaseosas grandes, 5 paquetes D. agua mineral sin gas, 2 paquetes D. agua  con gas, pago D.  mano D. obra del pintado D. su congeladora.
Su negocio se ubica en su propia casa y no tiene que ausentarse D. su hogar para poder trabajar, su esposo también aporta al hogar, cuenta con un trabajo que le genera un buen sueldo que les es suficiente para los dos incluso para poder ahorrar, pero  quiere seguir trabajando con Manuela Ramos porque ya es parte D. su familia.
texts.en:
Elgiba is a member of the communal bank Bellavista del Distrito D. Calleria, in the department of Ucayali. She is 60 years old, married with 6 children.

She works selling soft drinks. She has been woking for years with loans through Manuela Ramos. Only one of her children lives at home, but the child is economically independent. 

With this new loan of 3,000 soles she will buy 10 boxes of soft drinks, 7 cartons of large-size soft drinks, 5 packages of still mineral water, 2 packages of sparkling mineral water, and pay to have the icebox painted.

Her business is located in her own house and she does not have to leave home in order to work. Her husband also contributes to the house, with work that brings in good income which is enough for the two of them even to save some, but they continue working with Manuela Ramos because it is part of their family.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks

loans.name: Marta Cecilia

texts.es:
La señora Marta es una microempresaria de 40 años de edad quien se decica a confeccionar prendas de vestir a terceros; esta labor la aprendió en un taller que hace 6 años tenía su hermano quien le enseño todo lo relacionado con la confección. La señora Marta buscó independizarse y tener su propio taller desde su casa, el cual tiene hoy día dos máquinas y donde ella trabaja sola de 10:00 a.m. a 5:00 p.m., lo anterior debido a que su padre y una tía de ella quienes son adultos mayores dependen económicamente de ella y están al cuidado de la señora Marta.
Con una maquina adicional que espera adquirir la señora Martha podrá confeccionar prendas completas y de esta forma aumentar sus ingresos y por ende colaborar en mayor proporción con el sostenimiento de su hogar y el bienestar de sus familiares, en especial su padre y su tía quienes están orgullosos de la labor de la señora Marta quien  espera a corto plazo conseguir nuevos proveedores para que así su negocio crezca cada vez más.
texts.en:
Marta is a 40-year-old micro-businesswoman who makes clothes for other people.  She learned this trade in a workshop that her brother owned six years ago.  Her brother taught her everything there is to know about dressmaking.  Marta wanted to start working for herself and have her own workshop at home.  She now has two machines and works there alone from 10.00am to 5.00pm.  Her father and one of her aunts are elderly and are financially dependent on her.  They are in her care.

With the additional machine that she hopes to acquire, Marta will be able to make complete garments and increase her income.  This will allow her to contribute more towards supporting her household and looking after her family members' well-being, especially that of her father and her aunt who are proud of the work that she does.  Marta hopes, in the short term, to acquire new suppliers so that her business will grow even more.

loans.use: to buy an overlock sewing machine for her dressmaking workshop

loans.name: Etelvina

texts.es:
La señora Etelevina  es casada y vive con su esposo Joaquin,  quienes desde muy temprano en la mañana se levantan para elaborar sus productos de barro, doña Etelvina desde muy joven se dedica a la elaboración y venta de artesanía, vende adornos, flores, ollas, jarrones, todo elaborado de barro, su esposo se encarga en la decoración de los utensilios, los pinta y les hace diseños, en su casa todos los que han vivido con ella han aprendido el oficio.
Etelvina utilizara el credito para comprar tierra, barro, leña y pintura.
se aproxima la navidad y este tipo de artesanias se venden bastante y desea estar preparada para satisfacer las exigencias de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Etelvina is married and lives with her husband, Joaquín.  They rise very early in the morning to make their clay objects.  Etelvina has been making clay crafts like decorations, flowers, pots, jugs, etc and her husband decorates them; he paints them and makes designs on them.  Everyone who has lived with them in their house has learned this occupation.

Etelvina will use the loan to buy soil, clay, firewood and paint.  Christmas is approaching and these kinds of crafts sell quite a bit and she wants to be prepared to meet customer demand.

loans.use: to buy soil, clay, firewood and paint.

loans.name: Celia

texts.es:
La señora Celia es socia del banco comunal Bellavista, del Distrito D. Calleria, Departamento D. Ucayali, tiene 45 años D. edad, está casada y tiene tres hijos.
Los ocho años que vienen trabajando con los préstamos D. Manuela Ramos, se dedica a la venta D. churros (dulces con manjar blanco) en un colegio del centro D. la ciudad, su herramienta D. trabajo es una carretita donD. fríe los churros para luego envasarlo.
Con su nuevo préstamo D. S/. 2,500.00 nuevos soles comprará: 1 paquete D. harina, 2 kilos D. mantequilla, 1 caja D. leche, ½ saco D. azúcar, una sombrilla granD. que la necesita para poder cubrirse del calor. 
Esta actividad la realiza muy lejos D. su casa, todo los días tiene que trasladarse al centro D. la ciudad, su carrito tiene que guardarlo cerca D. su trabajo y tiene que pagar guardianía.
Su esposo es motocarrista (transportista) y es el que la traslada todo los días, D. esa manera se ahorra en pasaje.  Agradece a Manuela Ramos por darle la oportunidad D. poder seguir trabajando y apoyar a su familia.
texts.en:
Celia is a member of the “Bellavista” communal bank in Callería District, Ucayali Department.  She’s 45 years old, married and has three children.

During the eight years she’s been working with Manuela Ramos loans she’s been selling ‘churros’ (sweets maD. from ‘manjar blanco’ [a sweet, white spread or pastry filling maD. with milk]) in a school downtown.  Her work tool consists of a little cart where she fries the churros and then packages them.

She will use her 2500 new sol loan to buy: 1 package of flour, 2 kilos of butter, 1 box of milk, ½ sack of sugar and a large umbrella she needs to protect herself from the heat.

She does this activity quite far from home so she has to head downtown every day and has to store her cart near where she works and has to pay a fee to store it.

Her husband drives a motor cart and he gives her a riD. to work every day so she saves on transportation costs.  She is grateful to Manuela Ramos for giving her the opportunity to continue working and supporting her family.

loans.use: to buy an umbrella, flour, butter, etc.

loans.name: Miguel Darío

texts.es:
Por diferentes calles de Medellín, Miguel Darío ofrece los pandequesos que compra y posteriormente empaca para venderlos a sus vecinos y diferentes clientes. A sus 52 años, Miguel es un hombre luchador que espera en el futuro crecer su negocio para incrementar sus ingresos. 

Actualmente necesita de un préstamo para comprar mayor cantidad de pandequesos y así mejorar sus ventas.
texts.en: Miguel Darío buys Colombian style cheese bread that he then repackages and sells throughout Medellín’s streets to his neighbors and various customers.  At the age of 52, Miguel is a driven man who hopes in future to make his business grow to increase his income.  At present, he needs a loan to buy larger amounts of cheese bread to improve sales.

loans.use: to buy Colombian style cheese bread.

loans.name: Ines Albertina

texts.es:
La señora Ines Albertina es madre soltera, tiene tres hijos. Ines se dedica a la elaboración de ollas, cantaros, gallos y otros adornos elaborados de barro, se levanta temprano todos los dias para preparar su artesanía.
sus clientes son las personas que se dedican a comercializar con artesanía y los turistas que visitan la zona.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de materia prima para la elaboracion de las artesanias.
texts.en: Inés Albertina is a single mother; she has three children.  Inés manufactures pots, jugs, roosters and other decorations made from clay.  She rises early every day to make her crafts.  Her customers are people who sell crafts and tourists who visit the area.  She will use the loan to buy raw materials to make the crafts.

loans.use: to buy soil, clay, firewood, brushes and paint.

loans.name: Felimon

texts.es: Felimón de 21 años de edad, es soltero. Vive en el centro poblado de Puerto Mayo del distrito de Pichari. Felimón, Durante sus años de adolescencia, se dedicó a la actividad agrícola, ayudando a sus padres en tiempos de sembrio y cosecha,  Es por ello que no se arrepiente de nada por haber elegido la actividad agrícola como su labor, es mas se siente feliz con el trabajo que realiza, ya que le va muy bien en la producción de cacao. Asimismo cuenta con una extensión de café y este año recogió lo primeros frutos. Felimon agradece a sus padres por apoyarlo constantemente en el trabajo, en un futuro piensa continuar con sus estudios superiores. Este será su segundo credito con MFP, por lo que se compromete una vez más en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 2,000 nuevos soles, comprará insecticidas ya que sus plantaciones fueron afectados por hormigueros, asimismo contratará peones para realizar la poda de su parcela de café.
texts.en:
Felimón, 21, is single.  He lives in the Puerto Mayo settlement in Pichari District.  Felimón spent his adolescence helping his parents do farming chores especially during planting and harvesting.  Because of that, he does not regret having chosen agriculture as his occupation.  What’s more, he feels happy with the work he does because he does very well with his cocoa bean production.  

He also has a field planted with coffee and this year he had his first harvest.  Felimón is grateful to his parents for constantly supporting his work. In future, he plans to continue with his higher education.

This will be his second MFP loan and once again he commits to punctually make his payments.  He will use the 2000 new soles to buy insecticides because his plants were affected by ants; he will also hire day laborers to do the pruning of his coffee plants.

loans.use: to buy insecticide and to hire day laborers to prune the coffee plants.

loans.name: Margoth Elizabeth

texts.es:
Margoth Elizabeth tiene 21 años de edad es soltera no tiene hijos vive con la madre en Guaranda Sector Cuatro Esquinas Provincia de Bolívar.
LA VRC Cuatro Esquinas Central está formada por 12 socios que pertenecen al sector cuatro esquinas, los socios se dedican a diferentes actividades como son agricultura, crianza de animales, comercio y otros.
Margoth se dedica a la crianza de animales como: cerdos, pollos, además estudia.
Las compras y las ventas lo realiza en la Ciudad de Guaranda y en el sector donde vive.
Solicita el crédito para la compra de animales y mantenimiento de los mismos (alimentación).
Con la ayuda del crédito le ayudará a mejorar el estilo de vida.
El sueño es seguir estudiando y ser profesional. No se le ha presentado ningún tipo de problema.
En el tiempo libre le gusta escuchar música. Jugar, básquet, ver televisión y disfrutar de las fiestas del carnaval, navidad, San José.
texts.en:
Margoth Elizabeth, 21, is single and has no children.  She lives with her mother in Guaranda, Cuatro Esquinas Sector in Bolívar Province.  The “Cuatro Esquinas Central” communal bank has 12 members who are from Cuatro Esquinas.  They carry out a variety of activities like farming, animal husbandry, commerce and others.  Margoth raises animals like pigs and chickens; she’s also going to school.  Her purchases and her sales take place in the city of Guaranda and in sector where she lives.

She’s asking for the loan to buy animals and animal feed.  Support from the loan she will help her improve her standard of living.  Her dream is to continue with her studies and to become a professional.  She’s had no type of problem and in her free time likes to listen to music, play basketball, watch television and enjoy the Carnival, Christmas and feast day of Saint Joseph festivities.

loans.use: to buy animals and animal feed.

loans.name: Elsa Gregoria

texts.es:
Elsa se sigue dedicando al trabajo como docente,ella trabaja en el nivel primario,ella tambien se esta dedicamdo al negocio D. venta D. joyas como aretes,collares y pulseras y tambien se dedica al negocio D. venta D. ropa como pantalones,polos,blusas y polos al por mayor,por medio D. este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,la socia quiere ampliar el negocio D. venta D. joyas y venta D. ropa. La socia solicita el credito para comprar joyas como aretes,pulseras y aretes y tambien para comprar panatalones,polos y camisas al por mayor. 

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos D. su cuota.
texts.en: Elsa continues working as an elementary school teacher.  She’s also working at her jewelry business selling earrings, necklaces and blouses and also sells clothes like pants, shirts and blouses at wholesale.  Through these businesses she’s able to support her children.  She wants to expand the jewelry and the clothing sales and is asking for a loan to buy jewelry like earrings, bracelets and earrings and also to buy pants, shirts and Polo shirts at wholesale.  She is happy with the loan and commits to make her payments.

loans.use: to buy jewelry and clothes at wholesale.

loans.name: Nuevas Amigas Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “NUEVAS AMIGAS” iniciará su primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del centro focal German Busch, está compuesta por seis integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Concepción. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: venta de DVD, venta de medias Nilon, venta de comida, trenzado de mantas, tejido de macramé, venta de pan.

La señora Concepción,  indica que es la primera ves  que trabaja en Pro Mujer y que integro la institución por invitación de una promotora. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de tejido que viene trabajando hace años, aprendiendo el mismo de su familia.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra de lana) que comprara de la 16 de julio y posteriormente lo venderá a pedido. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, es soltera.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta todo.
texts.en:
The A.C. Nuevas Amigas will begin its first loan cycle with the German Busch regional center of Pro Mujer, and is made up of 6 members with a board headed by Concepción. The members of the communal bank are involved in various types of businesses, among which are the sales of DVDs, nylon stockings, food, braided rugs, macrame weavings, and bread.

Concepción says that this is her first time working with Pro Mujer and that she joined the community bank through the invitation of a  promotion. Currently she has a knitting business and has been doing this work for some years, learning it from her family.

The loan that she is now asking for is to raise capital to use in the purchase of wool from the 16 de Julio Market, which she will then sell. This way of work permits her to earn income in order to support her family; she is single.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responds that she likes everything about it.

loans.use: to buy wool

loans.name: Hilda

texts.es:
La señora Hilda es socia del banco comunal Bellavista del distrito Calleria, Departamento De Ucayali, tiene 50 años de edad, está casad y tiene tres hijos, solo 2 de ellos están a su cargo.
Son ocho años que viene trabajando con los préstamos de Manuela Ramos, se dedica a la venta de desayunos, todas las mañanas saca sus mesas y sombrillas para dar más comodidad  a sus comensales, que son en su mayoría colegiales.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 3,000.00 nuevos soles comprará: una refrigeradora, una extractora, una olla mediana, servilletas, ½ saco de azúcar, panes, mayonesa, 2 docenas de vasos grandes de vidrio.
Los hijos que tiene a su cargo, son los que le ayudan a sacar sus mesas y demás enseres que necesita para trabajar, hasta las diez de la mañana y el resto del tiempo lo ocupa realizando sus quehaceres propios de su hogar, su esposo  trabaja en construcción civil y es el encargado de pagar todo los gastos de la familia.
Gracias a Manuela Ramos por prestarle la ayuda necesaria en el debido momento y con el cual sigue trabajando para poder ayudar a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Hilda is a member of the “Bellavista” communal bank in Callería District, Ucayali Department.  She’s 50 years old, married and has three children but only two of them are still in her care. 

She’s been working with Manuela Ramos loans for 8 years.  She sells breakfasts.  Every morning she sets up her umbrellas and tables to provide more comfort for her diners who are school children for the most part.

She will use her new, 3000 new sol, loan to buy: a refrigerator, a juice extractor, a medium sized pot, napkins, ½ sack of sugar, bread, mayonnaise, 2 dozen large glass drinking glasses.

The children still in her care help her set up the tables and other utensils she needs to work.  She works until 10am and the rest of the time she does her household chores.  Her husband works in civil construction and he takes care of paying all family expenses.

Thanks to Manuela Ramos for providing her with the needed support at the right moment with which she continues working to help her children.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator and a juice extractor.

loans.name: Ruth

texts.es: Rut de 22 años de edad casado con Yuri de 27 años fruto de aquella relación tienen 2 hermosos hijos. Ellos viven en su casa propia ubicada en el centro poblado de Puerto Amargura del distrito de LLochegua. Rut recuerda que hace 3 años estaba en el mercado en el que todo era negocio de abarrotes, librería, artículos en general, zapatería y carnicería. Ante ello aprovechó en abrir una tienda de ropa, en efecto comenzó a vender dicha mercadería, a tal punto que sus clientes se quedaban con las ganas de hacerle alguna solicitud. Es así que cada quincena se va a la ciudad de Lima a comprar más ropa con la finalidad de reducir costos, además trae ropa de vanguardia para todo  los generos. A pesar de que su negocio le está resultando rentable, desea abrir un negocio en la avenida principal de su localidad, con la finalidad de que pueda vender variedad de prendas para todo el publico en general. Por lo general trabaja por cuenta propia pero en ocasiones recibe la ayuda de su querido esposo. Este será su primer credito con MFP, por lo que se compromete en pagar puntualmente sus cuotas. Con los 1,500 nuevos soles, comprará más prendas de vestir para venderlos.
texts.en: Ruth, 22, is married to Yuri, 27 and they have two beautiful children.  They live in their own house located in Puerto Amargura in Llochegua District.  Ruth remembers that three years ago she was in the market and all that was available were groceries, stationery, general merchandise, shoes and meat.  In face of that, she decided to open a clothing store and started, in fact, to sell that merchandise to such an extent that her customers remained behind to place specific orders with her.  This led to her going to Lima every two weeks to buy more clothes to reduce costs plus she brings cutting-edge clothes for both genders.  Even though her business is profitable she wants to open a store on her town’s main street to sell a variety of clothes to the general public.  Generally she works alone but sometimes her beloved husband helps her.  This will be her first loan with MFP so she commits to make her payments punctually.  She will use the 1500 new soles to buy more articles of clothing to sell.

loans.use: to buy more clothes.

loans.name: Maria Marleny

texts.es:
La señora Marleny  trabaja junto con su esposo todos los días en su tienda ubicada muy cerca de su vivienda localizada en el municipio de Envigado al Sur de Antioquia. La señora Marleny tiene 50 años de edad y vela por el bienestar de sus tres hijos y esposo.  
La señora Marleny espera comprar surtido para su tienda como gaseosas, snaks, dulces, productos de panadería y demás que vende en su negocio con el fin ofrecer a sus cliente mayor variedad y de esta forma incrementar sus ventas para poder en un futuro tener un negocio más posicionado y consolidado en el sector.
texts.en:
Marleny works alongside her husband every day in her store located very near to her house in the town of Envigado in south Antioquia.  Marleny is 50 years old and watches over her husband and her three children’s wellbeing.

Marleny hopes to buy an assortment of merchandise for her store like soft-drinks, snacks, candy, baked goods and others that she sells in her store to offer her customers a wider variety and increase sales so that in the future she can have a better positioned, consolidated business in the sector.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Luciana

texts.es:
Luciana se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de verduras,ella vende cebollas,zanahorias,tomates y vainitas y tambie se esta dedicando al negocio de crianza de animales como cuyes y chanchos,ella tanto los animales como las verduras lo vende en las diferentes ferias que existe en el distrito de Anta,la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar los negocios de venta de crianza de animales y venta de verduras . En esta oportunidad Luciana requiere el credito para comprar animales y tambien para comprar verduras como tomates,cebollas y zanahorias al por mayor.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Luciana is still selling vegetables; she sells onions, carrots, tomatoes and green beans.  She’s also raising animals like pigs and guinea pigs.  She sells both the vegetables and the animals in various street markets in Anta District.  She wants to expand and improve the sales of animals and vegetables so is asking for a loan to buy animals and also to buy vegetables like tomatoes, onions and carrots at wholesale.  She is happy with the loan and commits to make her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy animals and also to buy vegetables at wholesale.

loans.name: Emmy

texts.es:
La señora Emmy es socia del banco comunal Las Caribeñas del Distrito De Manantay, Departamento De Ucayali, tiene 30 años de edad, está separada y vive con su hijo.
Hace 2 años reingresó a este banco comunal, tiene un negocio de venta de comestibles, que por ahora es pequeño pero muy pronto lo estará implementando un poco mas con otros productos de primera necesidad.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 1,800.00 nuevos soles comprará: 1 caja de leche, 1 caja de aceite, 2 sacos de arroz, 5 paquetes de papel higiénico, 1 caja de ayudin, 1 caja de mayonesa, 1 caja de mermelada en sache, 1 bolsa de fideos, 1 paquete de sal, 1 saco de azúcar.
Es una persona  con muchas ganas de surgir en la vida y tiene otros negocios más rentables en mente, que espera tener funcionando muy pronto, para poder darle a su hijo todo lo que necesite, sobre todo cuando inicie sus estudios universitarios, será la alegría más grande poder ayudar a su hijo a cumplir sus metas, todo esto gracias a Manuela Ramos.
texts.en:
Emmy is a member of the communal bank "Las Caribeñas," in the Manantay district of the department of Ucayali.  She is 30 years old, separated, and lives with her child. 

She rejoined this communal bank 2 years ago.  She has a business selling groceries which is now quite small, buy very soon she will be expanding it with additional staple consumer products.  

With this new loan of 1,800 Peruvian soles, she will buy a case of milk, a case of cooking oil, 2 sacks of rice, 5 packages of toilet paper, a box of Ayudin brand cleaning products, a box of mayonnaise, a box of packets of marmalade, a box of noodles, a bag of salt and a sack of sugar.  

Emmy is a person who has a strong desire to succeed in life and she has some other, more profitable, businesses in mind that she hopes to get started very soon, so she can provide her child with everything he needs.  Most of all, when he starts his university studies, she will be very happy if she can help him to accomplish his goals.  For all of this, she is grateful to Manuela Ramos.

loans.use: to buy a case of milk, cooking oil and rice

loans.name: Alma Yudith

texts.es:
señora Alma Yudith es madre soltera, tiene una hija, viven con sus padres, Alma se dedica a la elaboración de tortillas, pan, paletas y comida, sus clientes son los niños del centro básico, maestros y vecinos de la zona, sus ventas son de lunes a domingo en las mañanas y las tardes. 
Doña Alma es una mujer luchadora y madre soltera que le ha tocado duro salir adelante.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de frutas, azucar, paletas, sorizantes, maiz, leña, harina y agua.
las ganancias las necesita para salir adelante con su hija.
texts.en: Alma Yudith is the single mother of a daughter, and she lives with her parents.  Alma has a business making tortillas, bread, popsicles and food.  Her customers are the children from a youth center, teachers, and neighbors from the area.  She makes her sales every day in the mornings and afternoons.  Alma is a tenacious woman and single mother who has had a tough time trying to get ahead.  She will use this loan to buy fruit, sugar, popsicles, flavorings, corn, firewood, flour and water.  She needs the earnings from this business to provide for her daughter.

loans.use: to buy fruit, sugar, popsicles, flavorings, corn, firewood, flour and water

loans.name: Eloisa

texts.es:
La señora Eloísa es socia del banco comunal Las Caribeñas, del Distrito Manantay, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 36 años de edad, está casada y tiene 2 hijos.
Con su primer préstamo de S/. 300.00 comenzó su pequeño negocio con algunos productos, los mas consumidos por la gente de este lugar, lo ha sabido manejar y ahora cuenta con una bodega bien surtida.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/ 1,500.00 nuevos soles comprará: ½ caja de jabón, 2 bolsas de detergente, 1 caja de añil, 1 caja de enjuague, 1 paquete de fideos, 1 paquete de harina, 5 casilleros de huevo, una caja de aceite.
Las mejoras que ha tenido en su casa han sido gracias a sus habilidades porque es la persona que está pendiente de ello, su esposo es maestro albañil y es quien realiza todo los arreglos en casa, de esa manera se ahorran en la mano de obra.
Agradece a Manuela Ramos por todo lo que ha podido conseguir y aprender de las demás personas que son un ejemplo de trabajo y dedicación.
texts.en:
Eloísa is a member of the communal bank Las Caribeñas, in the Manantay district, in the department of Ucayali. She is 36 years old, married and has 2 children.

With her first loan of 300 soles she began her small business with some products, mostly used by neighborhood people. She has known how to manage and now she has a well stocked store. With the new loan of 1,500 soles she will buy 1/2 of a box of soap, 2 bags of detergent, 1 box of laundry whitener, 1 box of rinse, 1 package of noodles, 1 package of flour, 5 cartons of eggs, and 1 box of oil.

The improvements that she has made to her home have been thanks to the workmanship of the person watching over it. Her husband is is master mason who makes all the repairs at home, and in this way she saves on labor costs.

She is grateful to Manuela Ramos for everything that she has gotten and learned from the other people that are an example of hard work and dedication.

loans.use: to buy 1/2 of a box of soap, 2 bags of detergent, and other supplies

loans.name: Angelita De La Cruz

texts.es: Angelita, de oficio costurera pero también se dedica a la venta de mercadería en general , ella tiene 46 años de edad, casada, madre de tres hijos, los cuales dos de ellos están en la universidad y el menor de sus hijos esta cursando el primer año de su secundaria. Doña Angelita tiene mas de 20 años de ser costurera su madre le enseño este oficio y ella lo aprendió de ello ha sobrevivido, ofreciendo la ropa que cose de manera ambulante y en su casa , donde abre las puertas de su casa  saca su maquina de coser, las tijeras, el hilo y el ruido resonante de su maquina cuando comienza a coser forman parte de su tareas diarias. Ella solicita el crédito para comprar tela, encajes, lentejuelas, hilos, elásticos, cintas de colores ya que necesita materia prima para trabajar y cumplir con los pedidos que le hacen y el crédito le vendría ayudar a suplir parte de sus necesidades. A ella le gustaría alquilar un local céntrico donde pueda poner una tienda de ropa y mercadería en general donde pueda vender parte de las piezas de ropas que ella misma cose y otras tipos de mercadería de uso general en su vecindario.
texts.en:
Angelita is a seamstress by profession but also sells general merchandise.  She is 46 years old, married, and has three children.  Two of her children are at university and her youngest is in his first year of high school.  Angelita has been a dressmaker for more than 20 years.  Her mother taught her this trade and it has enabled her to survive.  She offers the clothes that she sews both as an itinerant vendor and from her home.  She opens the doors of her house, gets out her sewing machine, scissors and thread.  This and the resonant noise of her machine form part of her daily work.  

Angelita is requesting a loan to buy fabric, lace, sequins, threads, elastic and colored ribbons as she needs raw materials so that she can work and fill the orders that she has.  The loan will help her to meet some of her needs.  Angelita would like to hire premises in a central area where she can set up a store to sell clothes and general merchandise.  She would sell some of the clothes that she sews herself and other general merchandise.

loans.use: to buy fabric, lace, sequins, thread, elastic and colored ribbons

loans.name: Felipe

texts.es: Felipe de 27 años de edad, convive con esmeralda de 25 años, fruto de esta relación tienen un hermoso bebé. Ellos viven en su casa propia ubicada en la comunidad de puerto Amargura del distrito de LLochegua. Felipe es un joven con gran entusiasmo para las labores agrícolas, ya que desde muy pequeño estuvo insertado a estas labores, gracias a que sus padres fueron sus primeros mentores quienes le enseñaron a cultivar diversos productos. Actualmente se dedica al cultivo de cacao, y posee una buena extensión de terreno cultivado, y anualmente produce mas de 2 toneladas. Generalmente trabaja juntamente con sus personales de campo y su esposa quien esta al pendiente del niño y el bienestar de la familia. Su producto recolectado y una ves sacado lo vende en el distrito de LLochegua a los acopiadores a un precio rentable. Felipe esta sorprendido por los buenos resultados que tiene, gracias al buen manejo agronómico que realiza Felipe. En un futuro desea invertir en una tienda de abarrotes para que su esposa pueda dedicarse a ello y tener otro ingreso la familia. Este será su primer credito con MFP, por lo que se compromete en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 1,500 nuevos soles, comprará abono para fertilizar su campo agrícola.
texts.en:
Felipe, 27, lives with Esmeralda, 25 and they have a beautiful baby.  They live in their own house located in Puerto Amargura in Llochegua District.  Felipe is a young man with much enthusiasm for farming since he’s been doing this kind of work since childhood; his parents were his first mentors who taught him how to grow various products.  

He currently grows cocoa beans and he has a good sized plot of planted farmland; he produces more than two tons at present. He usually works alongside his farm hands and his wife cares for their baby and for the family’s wellbeing.  His product is picked and once collected he sells it in Llochegua District to grain gatherers at a profitable price.  

In the future he’d like to invest in a grocery store so that his wife can tend to it and they can have an additional source of income.  This will be his first MFP loan so he commits to make his installment payments punctually.  He will use the 1500 new soles to buy manure to fertilize his fields.

loans.use: to buy sacks of manure.

loans.name: Irma

texts.es:
La señora Irma es socia del banco comunal Bellavista del Distrito Calleria, Departamento De Ucayali, tiene 34 años de edad, está casada y tiene 4 hijos.
Lleva buen tiempo trabajando con los préstamos de Manuela Ramos, tiene una bodega bien surtida en el mercado, donde pasa casi todo el día, en las mañanas tiene que regresar a su casa para hacer el almuerzo para sus hijos, a pesar que trabaja no descuida su hogar, siempre está al pendiente de sus hijos.     
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 2,500.00 nuevos soles comprará: 3 cajas de panetones, 2 cajas de leche, 6 cajas de chocolate, 1 kilo de canela, ½ kilo de clavo, 2 kilos de chuño, 1 paquete de harina preparada, ½ caja de huevos, 2 cajas de galletas, condimentos para embasar.
Su esposo es el que mantiene el hogar y los ingresos que ella genera son para hacer crecer el negocio familiar, tiene una persona que le ayuda en su bodega mientras está ausente, gracias a Manuela sigue creciendo.
texts.en: Irma is a member of the communal bank called Bellavista in the district of Calleria in Ucayali.  She is 34 years old and married with 4 children.  She has been working with loans from the communal bank for some time, and this has helped her stock her small general store where she works all day.  In the late mornings she returns home to prepare lunch for her children,  and still needs to take care of her house after finishing work.  Irma is always watching out for her children's well being.  With the loan, she will stock her store with various items such as pastries, milk, chocolate, cinnamon, cloves, flour, eggs, crackers and condiments.  Her husband covers the household expenses so Irma's income is used to grow the business.   Irma now has a person helping her at her store, and thanks to the loans she's received she continues to increase her sales.

loans.use: to stock her small grocery store with milk, chocolate, cinnamon, cloves, and other items.

loans.name: Donaldo

texts.es: El Sr. Donaldo es cliente antiguo de la institución, pago de forma responsable sus cuotas,  tiene  45 años de vida, casado y tiene tres hijos, el solo corre con los gastos de su hogar y de la educación de sus hijos, cuenta con casa propia ubicada en la zona Norte, se dedica a la carpintería hace mas de 23 años, y desde sus 19 años cuenta con taller propio, que trabaja junto a su hijo mayor cuando su hijo se encuentra de  vacaciones y también tiene un operador que trabaja con el como ayudante, es muy conocido en la zona por la calidad del terminado de sus trabajos, el crédito es para la compra de  un motor para un maquina tupi que se quemo y también para la compra de madera el señor Donaldo esta en muy agradecido con la institución por confiar en su persona, además de la oportunidad de poder adquirir y mejorar su herramienta de trabajo.
texts.en: Donaldo is an old client of the communal bank and has made his payments on time.  He is 45 years old, married with 3 children, and has his own house located in the northern zone.  Donaldo is the sole provider for the family's household expenses and for the cost of his children' s education.   He has worked as a carpenter for more than 23 years, from the age of 19, and now has his own shop as well as an assistant.  When his oldest son has vacations he joins his father in the business.  Donaldo is very well known in the area for the quality of his work.  This loan is to purchase machinery and wood for the shop.   Donaldo is very grateful to the communal bank for their confidence in him, and for the opportunity to grow his business.

loans.use: To purchase machinery and wood for his carpentry shop.

loans.name: Leonarda Isabel

texts.es:
Isabel sigue con su negocio de tienda de abarrotes donde vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz,azucar,leche,aceite,tambien la socia vende utiles escolares como cuadernos,lapíceros,libros y reglas y tambien se dedica al negocio de crianza de animales como chanchos,cuyes y gallinas,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes y crianza de animales.La socia solicita el credito para comprar animales,productos para la tienda de abarrotes como arroz,azucar y leche y tambien para comprar utiles escolares.


La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Isabel is still running her grocery store, where she sells basic staples such as rice, sugar, milk, and oil. She also sells school supplies such as notebooks, automatic pencils, books and rulers. She also has a business raising animals such as hogs, guinea pigs and hens. This is how she is getting her children ahead. She wants to expand and improve her grocery store and her animals business. She is requesting this loan for the purchase of animals and products for her grocery store such as rice, sugar and milk, and also for school supplies.
She is happy to have this loan and promises to repay her quotas on time.

loans.use: to purchase animals; products for her grocery store, such as rice, sugar and milk; and to buy school supplies.

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es: La socia Luz Marina actualmente sigue con su negocio de envio de encomiendas como pasteles, tortas en empaques especiales para que lleguen en perfectas condiciones, la socia también esvia verduras a Puerto Maldonado y algunos recados que le piden alla y la socia compra y los envia, algunas veces ella msima los lleva y le pagan los envios que han hecho, le hacen todo tipo de pedidos como granos, pasteles, tortas, telas, platiqueria, verduras, maíz entre otros, la socia trabaj con una empresa de buses y ya la conocen, ella en esta ocasion desea invertir el prestamo en la compra de productos que en Puerto Maldonado no hay y los mismos que siempre envia a sus diferentes clientes, la socia invertira el prestamo en la compra d epasteles, tortas, granos, telas, verduras. La socia desea seguir creciendo y reunir un ahorro que le permita pronto hacer un negocio propio y con local establecido.
texts.en:
Luz Marina continues with her business filling orders for goods such as pastries and cakes which she sends in special packages so that they arrive in perfect condition.  She also sends vegetables to Puerto Maldonado as well as other goods that they ask her for there.  She buys the goods and sends them.  Sometimes she takes the goods there herself and they pay her the shipping costs involved.  People make all kinds of orders with her for grains, pastries, cakes, fabric, plastic goods, vegetables, corn, etc.  Luz Marina works with a bus company who know her.

On this occasion, Luz Marina would like to invest her loan in buying products which cannot be found in Puerto Maldonado and which she always sends to her different customers.  She will invest her loan in buying pastries, cakes, grains, fabric and vegetables.  She would like to continue growing her business and save some money so that she can soon start her own business in established premises.

loans.use: to buy pastries, cakes, grains, fabric and vegetables

loans.name: Maria Teresa

texts.es: La Sra. María tiene 43 años de edad vive en Barrio Los Pinos con el Sr Ricardo (conyugue) tiene 5 hijos los cuales 3 de sus hijos son mayores de edad y 2 que todavía están a su cargo, la Sra. es propietaria de un taller mecánico ambos trabajan ahí desde hace 10 años. El crédito que solicito la Sra. Es para capital de trabajo (compra de repuesto, empaquetadura de culata, rodamiento, y otros) quedo muy  agradecida con la institución por la oportunidad que se le brindo al otorgarle su primer crédito "manifestó".
texts.en: María is 43 years old. She lives in the Los Pinos neighborhood with  Ricardo (spouse). She has 5 children, 3 of whom are grown, and she is still raising 2. Maria is the owner of a mechanic's shop. They have worked there for 10 years. The loan she has asked for is for working capital (to buy replacement parts, head gaskets, ball bearings and more). She is very grateful to the institution for the opportunity that has been given to her with her first loan.

loans.use: buy spare parts, head gaskets, ball bearings and other items.

loans.name: Lisceth Margarita

texts.es:
Lisceth Margarita tiene 19 años de edad es casada tiene un hijo, vive con el esposo, madre y el hijo de un año de edad en Guaranda Sector Cuatro Esquinas Provincia de Bolívar.
LA VRC Cuatro Esquinas Central está formada por 12 socios que pertenecen al sector cuatro esquinas, los socios se dedican a diferentes actividades como son agricultura, crianza de animales, comercio y otros.
Lisceth se dedica a la crianza de animales (pollos, cerdos) además se dedica a los estudios.
Las compras y las ventas lo realizan en Guaranda.
Solicita el crédito para la compra de animales y balanceado.
Con la ayuda del crédito le ayudará a mejorar los ingresos y situación de vida.
El sueño es poder terminar los estudios, tener un título profesional y tener un trabajo estable.
No se le ha presentado ningún tipo de problema. En los tiempos libres le gusta practicar el deporte como el básquet le gusta bailar, pasear y escuchar música, disfrutar de las fiestas del carnaval, San José, Navidad.
texts.en:
Lisceth Margarita is 19 years old, married with a child, lives with her husband, mother and 1 year old child in the Cuatro Esquinas [Four Corners] sector of Guaranda, in the Province of Bolivar.

The VCR Cuatro Esquinas Central is made up of 12 members who live in the Cuatro Esquinas sector. The members work in different businesses such as agriculture, breeding of animals, trade and others. 

Lisceth works growing animals (chickens and pigs) and she is also a student. She buys and sells in Guaranda. She is asking for a loan to buy animals and animal feed. The loan will help to increase her earnings and improve her way of life.

Her dream is to be able to finish her studies, to have a professional degree, and to have a stable job. She has never had any problems. In her free time she likes to play sports such as basketball, she likes to dance, she enjoys listening to music, and she enjoys the festivities of Carnival, San José and Christmas.

loans.use: to buy animals and animal feed

loans.name: Emiliana

texts.es: Emiliana es socia del Banco Comunal Alondras, tiene 57 años, es madre D. 9 hijos, venD. Artesanía y tiene su propio taller D. tejidos, es socia D. Finca Peru desD. hace 13 años, esta muy agradecida por todo lo que ayudaron, tanto en lo económico como en su vida personal, ha podido aumentar su negocio, las capacitaciones le ayudaron a ser mejor persona y negociante, el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en su negocio en la compra D. hilos para su taller, con sus ahorros ha podido construir su casa.
texts.en: Emiliana is a member of the Alondras communal bank. She is 57 years old and the mother of 9 children. She sells artisanal crafts and has her own weaving workshop. She has been a member of Finca Peru for 13 years. She is very grateful to everyone that helped her, financially and personally. She has been able to grow her business and the trainings have helped her be a better person and businessperson. The loan she has asked for will be invested in buying thread for her workshop. She has been able to build a house with the money she saved.

loans.use: to buy a variety of types of thread.

loans.name: Leslie Hindira

texts.es: La socia actualmente se dedica a la preparacion de mazamorras y arroz con leche, ella elabora sus mazamoras y los vende en una carretilla de manera ambulatoria, la socia vende frente a la universidad y en su carretilla ella lleva empujando tambien por la puerta del hospital del seguro social; la socia desea el credito para poder implementar su carretita y comprar los potecitos de tres tamaños para la venta de mazamorra y arroz con leche, la socia solicita el prestamo para comprar potecitos descartables, ingredientes como canela, clavo de olor, arroz, leche, maíz morado, piña entre otros ingredientes secretos.
texts.en: This member makes desserts such as rice with milk, which she sells in a mobile cart near a local university and near the social security hospital; she now wishes to expand her sales, and with this loan she plans to buy three different sizes of containers for the desserts, as well as ingredients such as cinnamon, cloves, rice, milk, purple corn, pineapple and other secret spices.

loans.use: to buy disposable cartons, as well as ingredients such as cinnamon, cloves, rice, milk, purple corn, pineapple and other secret spices.

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es:
El socio se sigue dedicando al trabajo como docente del nivel secundario en el distrito de Anta,el socio ahora se esta dedicando al negocio de venta de productos lacteos como leche,yogurt y quesos,el reparte a las diferentes tiendas donde vende productos lacteos,por medio de este negocio el socio saca adelante a sus hijos,la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de productos lacteos. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar leche,quesos y yogurt al por mayor.  

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: This member works as a high school teacher in the Anta district,and also sells dairy products such as milk, cheese and yogurt, which he distributes to various business establishments.  Through this business he has supported his children and he now wishes to expand his sales. He seeks this credit to buy milk, cheese, and yogurt wholesale.  He is pleased with his participation and is committed to prompt repayment.

loans.use: to buy milk, cheese, and yogurt wholesale.

loans.name: Mendez Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “MENDEZ” iniciará su decimo tercer en Pro Mujer, como parte del centro focal German Busch, está compuesta por nueve integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Cristina. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: productos Herbalay, venta de fruta, venta de ropa, venta de comida, tejido de busos, venta de bañadores, venta de verduras, tejidos, pollos a la broster.

La señora Cristina, indica que hace seis meses que trabaja en Pro Mujer y que integro la institución por invitación de una vecina. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de tejido que viene trabajando hace años, aprendiendo el mismo de su familia.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra de lana) que comprara de la 16 de julio y posteriormente lo venderá a pedido. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, pues ella vive en unión libre y tiene cuatro hijos.  

En al fotografía nos acompaña la prima de la señora Alicia, ella es la que esta con sombrero blanco y esta agachada.
texts.en:
The “Mendez” communal bank will start its thirteenth cycle in Pro Mujer as part of the German Busch focal center.  It has nine members led by a governing board headed by Cristina.  The members of the communal bank carry out a variety of businesses among which se have Herbalife products sales, fruit sales, clothing sales, food sales, sweatshirt making, swimsuit sales, vegetable sales, knitting and Broasted-style chicken sales.

Cristina indicates that she’s been working in Pro Mujer for six months and that she joined thanks to an invitation from a neighbor.  She currently has a knitting business that she’s had for several years having learned it in her family.

The loan she’ll take out now is to increase capital.  She will buy wool in the 16 de Julio market and then will sell it on order.  This way of working allows her to generate resources to support her family because she lives in a common law relationship and has four children.

The cousin of Alicia is also in the photo, she is wearing a white hat and is crouching.

loans.use: to buy wool yarn.

loans.name: Ixoqui'b Ajchac Group

texts.es:
La señora Francisca P. es casada,  tiene 5 años D. edad, no tuvo la oportunidad D. estudiar, tiene 3 hijos 2 D. los cuales estudian, se dedica a la venta D. ropa, inicio este negocios con el propósito D. superar y apoyar a su familia, lleva 18 años D. experiencia.

Organiza un grupo para solicitar un préstamo que le servirá para la compra D. mercadería, sudaderos, suéteres, chumpas, camisas, playeras, etc. espera en el futuro tener un capital amplio. Las demás integrantes se dedican al comercio, la artesanía y a la crianza D. animales.
texts.en: Francisca P. is married and has 3 children, of which 2 are students.  She did not have the opportunity to study, and sells clothing to support herself, and her family.  She has done so for the last 18 years.  She has organized a communal lending group that will buy merchandise such as sweaters, jackets, shirts, t-shirts with its funds.  Other members sell items such as handcrafts and raise farm animals.

loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Maria Olga

texts.es:
María Olga tiene 38 años de edad es soltera tiene una hija, vive con la madre y con la hija de doce años de edad en Guaranda sector Cuatro esquinas Provincia de bolívar.
LA VRC Cuatro Esquinas Central está formada por 12 socios que pertenecen al sector cuatro esquinas, los socios se dedican a diferentes actividades como son agricultura, crianza de animales, comercio y otros.
María se dedica a al crianza de animales cómo pollos, cuyes, cerdos y la agricultura  siembra papas maíz y vive en la casa de la madre.
Las compras y las ventas los realiza en Guaranda, Solicita el crédito para comprar cerdos.
Con la ayuda del crédito le ayudaría a tener otros ingresos. El sueño es poder comprar un terreno y hacer una casa..
A los desafíos que se ha presentado son las heladas ene l cultivo de las papas.
En los tiempos libres le gusta salir a pasear en la ciudad, Atender a la familia fiestas de San José, Navidad y Carnaval.
texts.en:
María Olga is 38, and a single mother.  She lives with her mother and daughter, who is 12, in Guaranda, Cuatro Esquinas, Bolivar Province.
The lending community of Cuatro Esquinas Central has 12 members, and they are involved in varied trades such as agriculture, raising animals, sales and other activities.  María raises animals such as chickens, guinea pigs, pigs and also grows crops such as potatoes and corn.
She buys and sells products in Guaranda, and seeks this credit to purchase pigs to raise.  This credit will allow her to improve her income. One day, she dreams of owning some land and her own home.  Growing crops is difficult due to freezing conditions that affect her potato fields.
In her free time, Maria enjoys walking in town, and attending local festivals such as those at Christmas and Carnival.

loans.use: to buy pigs

loans.name: Agripina

texts.es: Agripina es socia del Banco Comunal Alondras, tiene 57 años y es madre D. 7 hijos, es socia D. FINCA Peru desD. hace 18 años, se dedica a la venta D. artesanías, telares, frazadas, con los préstamos que ha recibido pudo abrir su tienda D. Artesanía, agradece mucho a Morenita (fundadora D. FINCA Peru) porque le enseñó a ser honesta, puntual, y responsable, con la rentabilidad D. su negocio pudo educar a sus hijos. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra D. hilos para poder hacer los telares. Su meta es poder empezar a construir el terreno que tiene.
texts.en: Agripina is a member of the Alondras communal bank, She is 57 years old and the mother of 7 children. She has been a member of FINCA Peru for 18 years. She sells artisanal crafts, looms, and blankets. With the money she has received she was able to open her artisanal crafts store. She is very grateful to Morenita (founder of FINCA Peru), because she showed her how to be honest, punctual, and responsible with her business' profits and be able to educate her children. The loan she is asking for will be invested in buying thread to make the looms. Her goal is to be able to start construction on the land she has.

loans.use: to buy thread for her looms.

loans.name: Marlene Del Rocio

texts.es:
Marlene del Rocio tiene 40 años de edad es soltera tiene dos hijos, vive con la madre y con los dos hijos de 16 y 7 años de edad en Guaranda Sector Cuatro Esquinas Provincia de Bolívar.
LA VRC Cuatro Esquinas Central está formada por 12 socios que pertenecen al sector cuatro esquinas, los socios se dedican a diferentes actividades como son agricultura, crianza de animales, comercio y otros.
Marlene se dedica a la crianza de cerdos y a la agricultura, siembra de maíz en terrenos de arriendo.
Las Comparas y las ventas lo realizan en Guaranda. Solicita el crédito para comprar cerdos y alimento .
Con la ayuda del crédito le ayudará a mejorar un poco los ingresos económicos.
El sueño es poder comprar terreno y construir una casa propia en el mismo sector por donde vive. No se le han presentado ningún tipo de problemas  y espera que en el futuro tampoco se le presente ningún tipo de problema.
En los tiempos libres le gusta pasear, viajar, ver televisión, descansar y disfrutar de las fiestas del carnaval, San José y Navidad.
texts.en:
Marlene del Rocio is 40 years old.  She is single and has two children.  She lives with her mother and two children who are 16 and 7 years old.  They live in Cuatro Esquinas, in Guaranda, in Bolívar province.

The 'Cuatro Esquinas Central' community bank has 12 members who live in Cuatro Esquinas.  They are engaged in different business activities such as farming, livestock raising, commerce, etc.

Marlene raises pigs and farms.  She grows corn on land which she rents.

Marlene makes her purchases and sales in Guaranda.  She is requesting this loan to buy pigs and feed.  The support of this loan will help her to improve her income a little.
